29#include "_libdwarf.h"
30
31__RCSID("$NetBSD: dwarf_str.c,v 1.3 2016/02/20 02:43:41 christos Exp $");
32ELFTC_VCSID("Id: dwarf_str.c 3295 2016-01-08 22:08:10Z jkoshy ");
33
34int
35dwarf_get_str(Dwarf_Debug dbg, Dwarf_Off offset, char **string,
36 Dwarf_Signed *ret_strlen, Dwarf_Error *error)
37{
38 Dwarf_Section *ds;
39
40 if (dbg == NULL || string == NULL || ret_strlen == NULL) {
41 DWARF_SET_ERROR(dbg, error, DW_DLE_ARGUMENT);
42 return (DW_DLV_ERROR);
43 }
44
45 ds = _dwarf_find_section(dbg, ".debug_str");
46 if (ds == NULL) {
47 DWARF_SET_ERROR(dbg, error, DW_DLE_NO_ENTRY);
48 return (DW_DLV_NO_ENTRY);
49 }
50
51 if (offset > ds->ds_size) {
52 DWARF_SET_ERROR(dbg, error, DW_DLE_ARGUMENT);
53 return (DW_DLV_ERROR);
54 }
55
56 if (offset == ds->ds_size) {
57 DWARF_SET_ERROR(dbg, error, DW_DLE_NO_ENTRY);
58 return (DW_DLV_NO_ENTRY);
59 }
60
61 *string = (char *) ds->ds_data + offset;
62 *ret_strlen = strlen(*string);
63
64 return (DW_DLV_OK);
65}
66
